snippet: Louis Segna is charged with 11 counts of falsely reporting an incident, but his lawyer told jurors that the tips were just hard to substantiate.
abstract: Jury is set to decide fate of Louis Segna, Brooklyn man who is on trial for making false 911 calls.
lead_paragraph: Louis Segna is charged with 11 counts of falsely reporting an incident, but his lawyer told jurors that the tips were just hard to substantiate.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Man on Trial on Charges of Making False Reports to 911
headline.main: A Caller Said Something; Had He Seen Something?
headline.print_headline: A Caller Said Something; Had He Seen Something?
